metadata.name: En priere
metadata.description:
My work has always been with prayer.  
Prayer is not simply the act of making a wish.  
It is a vow to oneself.  
We pray, declare our thoughts, and take action.  
  
The feelings we creators put into our works are also a form of "prayer.  
Remember to touch various works of art and enjoy the richness of time.  
  
Various difficulties will come our way.  
They will appear again and again.  
Each of us has a life that cannot be replaced.  
Each one of life's joys, sorrows, and pleasures.  
  
Prayer alone may not make things better. However, I believe that without people's prayers, it would be difficult for things to truly turn around.  

A thousand folded paper cranes are a symbol of peace and a harbinger of good things to come.  
A place of prayer can make people feel positive.  
People's thoughts and prayers go round and round.
